attributes.action: give more votes to the people. Give us people the chance to vote not just on elections, but other important decisions and issues concerning us and our country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When was the last time you were given a vote on anything other than the elections? It just doesn't happen any more, thus it is not true democracy. Is there any reason why we cannot be given more voting powers?
We need more power to the people!
We need to be told exactly what we are voting for. We need our power back. I call that for every law and decision that affects the people of the UK in a strong way (e.g. The Lisbon Treaty), there should be a referendum for the people on the electoral role to vote on.
